people_also_ask.heading: It's an entertaining scifi-action-horror and that's never a terrible thing to sit down to. people_also_ask.heading: Parents need to know that Resident Evil has extremely gross and graphic violence, with many disgusting deaths and truly icky monsters. Characters are in extreme peril and most of them are killed. There is very strong language and a brief sexual situation with nudity.

knowledge_panel.description: welcome to raccoon city, once the booming home of pharmaceutical giant umbrella corp. the company's exodus left the city a wasteland, a dying town with great evil brewing below the surface. when that evil is unleashed, a group of survivors must work together to uncover the truth behind umbrella and make it through the night.
